propertyInfos.label: Background image
propertyInfos.hint: Image to use for the start page background.
propertyInfos.name: startBackground

propertyInfos.label: Brand color
propertyInfos.hint: Color to use as the primary color.
propertyInfos.name: brandColor

propertyInfos.label: Title font file
propertyInfos.name: mediumFontTTF
propertyInfos.hint: Sets the custom title font to be used throughout the app. This font will be used in headings, page titles, and so on.

propertyInfos.label: Text font file
propertyInfos.name: regularFontTTF
propertyInfos.hint: Sets the custom text font to be used throughout the app. This font will be used in descriptions of photos, about text, and so on.

propertyInfos.label: Feedback email
propertyInfos.hint: Email address to which user feedback should be sent.
propertyInfos.name: feedbackEmail

propertyInfos.label: Show disclaimer
propertyInfos.hint: Shows the disclaimer text as a pop-up in the app. This text is the content from the Access and Use Constraints section of the Details tab.
propertyInfos.name: showDisclaimer

propertyInfos.label: Nearby web apps
propertyInfos.hint: Enter an ArcGIS query to list valid Nearby web apps in the gallery. This can be a single valid item ID of the web app such as id:9d3f21cfd9b14589968f7e5be91b52c8 or a group ID containing multiple web apps such as group:47597bdf4b6d49fd85c0f4175a6e7b60, or a search query with multiple web app item IDs such as (id:9d3f21cfd9b14589968f7e5be91b52c8 OR id:6efd8324a57247c79a7ec9a66a9bf581).
propertyInfos.name: galleryMapsQuery

propertyInfos.label: Total results to show in gallery
propertyInfos.hint: Enter the maximum number of web apps that should be returned from querying the portal.
propertyInfos.name: maxNumberOfQueryResults

propertyInfos.label: Portal URL
propertyInfos.hint: URL of the Portal to query for Nearby web apps.
propertyInfos.name: portalUrl

propertyInfos.label: Support secured web apps
propertyInfos.hint: Provides the ability to sign in to an organization for access to secured web apps per the query parameters.
propertyInfos.name: supportSecuredMaps

propertyInfos.label: Skip sign in
propertyInfos.hint: If Support secured web apps is set to true, setting this option to true provides the ability to bypass sign in and only show publicly available web apps in the gallery.
propertyInfos.name: enableAnonymousAccess

propertyInfos.label: API Key
propertyInfos.hint: Provide an API key to grant access to routing service for showing turn-by-turn directions in the Nearby template. Notice that an API key is created for you when you sign up for an ArcGIS Developer account. If you already have an ArcGIS account, you can sign in to ArcGIS developer account to view this API key and create more API keys.
propertyInfos.name: APIKey

propertyInfos.label: Portal sort field
propertyInfos.hint: Used to sort web apps shown in the gallery. Possible values include: title, created, type, owner, modified, avgRating, numRatings, numComments, numViews.
propertyInfos.name: portalSortField

propertyInfos.label: Portal sort order
propertyInfos.hint: Used in conjunction with gallery sort field to order web apps in ascending or descending. Possible values as asc or desc.
propertyInfos.name: portalSortOrder
